1b1('dul ba): / rgyug rA skad du/ bi nA ya k+Shud+tha ka bas+t+ra/ bad skad du/
1b2('dul ba): bgran tshogs kyig ni// dam po dang de// zlum swA du
1b3('dul ba): phyag 'tshal lo// phran tshigs kyi gag sdom ni/ seng go chan pa
2a1('dul ba): chos gos dang // shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus// rgyus pa 'gyod
2a2('dul ba): pa dbyung ba nyid// phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad// / bsdus pa'i sdom
2a3('dul ba): ni nisi phrag sen me bces pa dang // lhung bzed yan lug me long skyes// lA mu phran chu
2a4('dul ba): chags mon sran sde'u// rkang pa bkru dang gos mdud do// sdom ni/ song ga dang /
2b1('dul ba): ni sa gar dang // nya phyis dri yi lag ris dang // ka ba dang ni skud pa gnyis// lag rgyan dang ni sor gdub rmya/
2b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhug
2b3('dul ba): so/ drug sde nyid rnams snga dri sham thabs dang / chos gis bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ yangs pa can du
2b4('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / yangs pa can gyi bar dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar gyi bar skabs de na/
2b5('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi lid tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/
3a1('dul ba): #/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga' ba'i tshul dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi brtsal ba dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol
3a2('dul ba): mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dag dang / khrus kyi yo byad sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo
3a3('dul ba): nye dga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi lid tsha bI 'di dag dang / skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum
3a4('dul ba): pa'i lha rnams dper mdzad na/ re zhig de dag gi skyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o zhes/ de rnams blod nas de dag gi skyed mos tshal du
3a5('dul ba): zhugs so// de dag gis de na brtsal ba'i yo byad mda' bo che dang / drang ba dang / 'phang rdo sna tshogs dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol
3a6('dul ba): me'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / sked snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang / khrus
3b1('dul ba): kyi yo byad so bag dang / bkru ba'i phye ma dang / mgo bkru ba skyu rur sna tshogs mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis phan tshun smras pa/ dga' bo ni dga' bo yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa dum
3b2('dul ba): 'di dag yod na/ ci re zhig brtsal ba bya 'am/ 'on tre gar bya 'am/ glu brang ngam/ rol mo'i sgra bya 'am/ khrus bya/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag bkrus nas ring zhig lon gyis
3b3('dul ba): je khrus bya'o zhes de dag blod nas so phag dag gis drud cing drung nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dag la mkhas pas/ khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid
3b4('dul ba): du 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ sil snyan yan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i sgra lta bu byung ngo // skye bo'i tshogs phal po che lam de nas 'gro bas/ sgra de thos pa dang / de rnams
3b5('dul ba): rna ba byol ste yud tsam bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag yangs pa can gyi ling tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshol na/ gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa ltar 'dong ngam/ de ltar bya'o zhes ltad mo la
3b6('dul ba): yid 'dun pa de dag myur bar chas te/ skyed mos tshal du drong nas/ de dag nang du zhugs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo // de dag gis de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag phyog
3b7('dul ba): gang na/ gar mkhan rnams gar bgyid/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis bye brag mi byed de/ gar mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'di lta bu 'byung ngam/ 'phags pa dag 'o na 'di
4a1('dul ba): su'i sgra lags/ shes ldan dag khro bo cag lus drud nas khrus byas pa yin no// 'phags pa dag ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzing ram/ bkren pa khyed
4a2('dul ba): kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan la/ dge sbyong kho bo cag 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to// khyed kho bo cag gi rjes su ston pa yin nam ci/ ma smra bar deng / khyed la gnod pa byas sa re zhes de rnams
4a3('dul ba): kyis de dag bsdigs pa dang / spa gong nas dong ste/ yangs pa can du zhugs nas lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'phya bar brtsams so// dge slong
4a4('dul ba): rnams kyis skabs de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams so phag dag
4a5('dul ba): gis lus drud de/ khrus byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o// 'drung na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
4a6('dul ba): dge slong gis so phag gis lus drung de khrus mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang dge slong dag rkang pa ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas bzhin bsod snyoms la 'jug pa de dag zam ze dang
4a7('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed zhabs ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas ni/ ci ste dri ma sbyang bar mi bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs
4b1('dul ba): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // ci 'phags pa khyed dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ gtsug
4b2('dul ba): lag khang du dong ba dang / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma bcas
4b3('dul ba): pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gang ba so pag gis drung byar gnang ngo // lus gzhan ni ma yin te/ 'drung na 'gal tshabs can du gyur ro//
4b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das langs pa can na sprera'u rdzing gi 'gras ltung ba brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams snga zo sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te spangs pas
4b5('dul ba): dru bsod soms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis blam ze zhigs dkar gyis so ris gsum byugs nas skyong mo la rgyu zhing de'i bslangs pa pa yang mang du rnyed par mthong ngo // drug
4b6('dul ba): sde rnangs kyis smraslo pa/ dga' boni dga' bo babs 'dri ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de ltar bya zhes / de rnams byi de nyings dkar thos so ris su su ma gyu //
4b7('dul ba): sa song pa sa tshugs pa ma dang pa rnams kyis mthong ngas 'bru zhing grus bor ba'o// gus par sngal nas sdom pa dang / rdus pa rnams kyis
5a1('dul ba): bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci
5a2('dul ba): zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed
5a3('dul ba): kyi phyag ma yin 'phags pa bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gso gro la
5a4('dul ba): zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa
5a5('dul ba): nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams so ris gsum dri ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis ris gsum bri bar mi bya'o// dge slong sor sa gsum 'dzin 'gal
5a6('dul ba): mas cad du 'gyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so ris gsum mi byug g-i zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag sman pas bsgo yang khrum sas kyi srung ba'i skabs de/
5a7('dul ba): dge slong mam kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsala'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lang ni sngam ni bgyis pa'o// tshan ma
5b1('dul ba): de lta bas na sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal du rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so//
5b2('dul ba): drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de rnams kyis bram ze 'gi'u wang gi thig le byas pa
5b3('dul ba): zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor zhi ston mo'i bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag
5b4('dul ba): cag kyang 'di ltar bya'o// legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa byas nas/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
5b5('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par spro'o// gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par
5b6('dul ba): bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams/
5b7('dul ba): ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag
6a1('dul ba): cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so// de'i slad du bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas pa
6a2('dul ba): dang de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung /
6a3('dul ba): zad ci byung ba ni dge slong dag 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis 'gi'u wang gi thig le drag gis brgyan par mi bya'o//
6a4('dul ba): brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
6a5('dul ba): dge slong zhig dpral bar rma byung ba de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzangs bdag la sman ston cig/ 'phags pa rma'i thon kor 'gi'u wang gis bskus shig dang / khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
6a6('dul ba): des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/
6a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ de lta bas na dge slong dag sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge/
6b1('dul ba): gis so phrag gis lus drung par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang / dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis 'drung par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'phyis kyis drung /
6b2('dul ba): par mi bya'o// 'drung na 'gal che bas can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'ang
6b3('dul ba): ban bzhugs so// drug sde rnams dris byugs te/ gzhon nu rnams kyi nang du dong nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag nged kyi dri ji lta sdoms shig/ de dag gis spras pa/ gnas
6b4('dul ba): brtan ci khyed dris byugs sam byugs so// gnas brtan khyed dris byug tu rung ngam/ rung yang rung mi rung yang rung ste/ nged kyis ni byugs so// de dag 'phya spong
6b5('dul ba): kha zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zang ci byung ba
6b6('dul ba): nyug pa las byung gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dri byug par mi bya'o// nyug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis ni
6b7('dul ba): byug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nang pa zhig sman po'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs bdag la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dris
7a1('dul ba): byugs na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs ci kho bo 'dod pa spyod dam/ 'phags pa khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni 'tsho bar mi nuso//
7a2('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ sman pa'i lung gis dri
7a3('dul ba): bcang bar bya'o// dge slong dag dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug cing bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos ston par byed/ bram ze dang khyim
7a4('dul ba): bdag gi khyim rnams su yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
7a5('dul ba): ngas dge slong ni 'chang ba'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong dri 'chang bas dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim
7a6('dul ba): bdag 'ongs shing lpags pa rnams la ris bstan par mi bya bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i nas sos par gyur ba de'i rgyu khrus byas nas dri ma med byer
7a7('dul ba): byung ba dang / dge 'dun gyinang du 'jug par bye zom ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lpags pa rnams la chos bstan par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi phyi rnams bu 'thobar bya'o//
7b1('dul ba): dge slong ni 'chang bas kun tu spyang ba'i chos ji snang bcas pa pa'i ni yang dag par blangs te mi 'dras 'gas rnabs can du 'gyur ro// zas pa dang byis bdag dang yan dag dge slong rnams pam/
7b2('dul ba): 'dul ba ni dge slong rnams 'gyod nas mi len pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe na
7b3('dul ba): mu stegs can rnams yon gnas lags da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas/ da ltar khyed yon gnas lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rte/
7b4('dul ba): 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam brgyags ma mchis par mchi 'am/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o//
7b5('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas de dag nyid kyi
7b6('dul ba): mdun du bor ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rin thang bzhin du nyo nyon khyed kyis blangs te dor ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
7b7('dul ba): 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas dor bar mi bya'i 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dri'i lag ris byug par
8a1('dul ba): bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la dri'i lag ris nyug go// de dag gis smras pa
8a2('dul ba): 'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gis mchod rten ma mthong ngam bdag cag gis ni khyed kho na la phul te/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni sngar phul lags so// skabs de dge/
8a3('dul ba): srong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa blangs nas gnas khang la byug par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la
8a4('dul ba): byugs pa dang de dag dri gtsang khang yin no snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
8a5('dul ba): stsal pa/ nang du byug par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis drang thad du byugs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas dang nye ba 'am
8a6('dul ba): rkang pa dang nye bar byug par bya zhing dri zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas dus dus su bsdam par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin
8a7('dul ba): byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs 'jigs lha'i tshal ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so// ji tsam na rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs byed kyis khang bzangs pad+ma ris byed du bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'dra
8b1('dul ba): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te bcom ldan 'das khang bzangs pad+ma'i ris su dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// nye dga' bo zan
8b2('dul ba): za ba'i tshe lag pas ka ba la bsnun pa dang khang bzangs pad+ma ris g.yos par gyur to// 'drim mkhan rnams kyis smras pa 'phags pa rgyal bu rtogs byed kyis khang bzangs pad+ma ris tshon
8b3('dul ba): brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra bar byas pa khyed kyis gzhig gam ci nye dga' bos smras pa bkren pa rtogs byed 'di la lhags par chags pas dus byas nas gar skye gtol med do// khyed kyang
8b4('dul ba): 'di la lhags par chags pas dus byas nas yi dgas lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
8b5('dul ba): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bsnun pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pas ka ba
8b6('dul ba): la bsnun par mi bya'o// bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ka ba la lag pas bstan par mi bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang drug sde rnams wa/
8b7('dul ba): tshur dang / gru mo dang / phrag pa dang / mgo dang / rtsabi logs dang / rgyab dang / sked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / rkang pa dang dbyug pa dang
9a1('dul ba): bong ba dang / gzhan gyis snun par byed pa nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o// drug sde/
9a2('dul ba): rnams rtsig pa dang / sa dang / gzhan la snun par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gzhan la yang gang dag gis bsnun par mi bya'o// snun na 'gal
9a3('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshil mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams snga dro
9a4('dul ba): mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te/ slong mo la rgyu zhing / des bza' ba dang bca' ba yang mang du rnyed pa mthong nas/
9a5('dul ba): drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de lta bu bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyid tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te bsod snyoms la zhugs
9a6('dul ba): pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang
9a7('dul ba): phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la dge slong rnams
9b1('dul ba): ni phyag bya ba yin na// de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma
9b2('dul ba): lags so// de lnga lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/ bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas
9b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na
9b4('dul ba): dge slong gis tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par mi bya'o// 'dogs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
9b5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/
9b6('dul ba): de dag gis bram ze dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings pa zhig dus ston zos nas dbang po che mi ste/ khyim nas byung ba mthong ba dang / de dag gis smras pa
9b7('dul ba): dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
10a1('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus
10a2('dul ba): par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par
10a3('dul ba): smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze
10a4('dul ba): lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas/ bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug
10a5('dul ba): go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams
10a6('dul ba): tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o// 'ching na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
10a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs kho
10b1('dul ba): bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig ces byas pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bzlas brjod byas te/ lag pa la bcings na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur/
10b2('dul ba): ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
10b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i
10b4('dul ba): lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
10b5('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung ba la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
10b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan
10b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o// dge slong rnams nad sos par gyur
11a1('dul ba): nasaskud pa bab bab tu 'dor ba mi ma yin pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa dag nged kyis sos par byas na/ da ma gus par byed pa lta skabs de
11a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bab bab tu dor bar mi bya ste/ gal te nad ma byang na chos gos kyi
11a3('dul ba): mtha' 'am/ rgya cang la bcing bar bya'o// 'on te thams cad kyi thams cad du sos par gyur nas ka ba'i ser ga 'am rtsig pa'i gseb tu gzhug par bya'o//
11a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos
11a5('dul ba): lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi rgyan sgo ma'i nang du gzhag pa drug sde rnams kyis rkang rgyan dang lag rgyan dag
11a6('dul ba): thogs nas smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo// ji lta mdzes sam/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gis sbas pa 'phags pa khyed mgo ni phyi/ mchan khung ni spun 'di la lus mdzes pa ci zhig yod
11a7('dul ba): gdon mi za bar dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar gyur to zhes byas pa dang / de rnams kyang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la
11b1('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na/
11b2('dul ba): dge slong gis lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan gyis bdag brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
11b3('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gtsug lag khang du ma byin par len pa rnams kyis/ dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang / gang zag gis gnas khang dag nas brkus so// dge slong
11b4('dul ba): gzhan dag cig gi yang stor na/ bdag cag gi stor nas ji tsam lon pa ma tshor ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
11b5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de lta bas na gnang gis rgya bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis
11b6('dul ba): gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang shel las byis pa dang sor gdub rgya rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag bcangs so// de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag
11b7('dul ba): mthong nas/ lag pa brkyang ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs nad med cig/ nad med cig/ de dag gis smras pa 'phags pa 'di ci lags bzhin bzangs bcom ldan
12a1('dul ba): 'das kyis rgya gnang ngo // de dag 'phya smod kha zer zhing / dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ 'di na da
12a2('dul ba): ltar rgyal tha snyad 'dogs shing rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das
12a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa'i rgya bcang bar mi bya/ song gdub rgya yang bcang bar mi bya'i 'on kyang rgya lnga por gan
12a4('dul ba): dang / zangs las byas pa dang / 'khar ba las byas pa dang / ba so las byas pa dang / rA las byas pa bcang bar bya'o// drug sde rnams kyis rgyal skyes pa dang bud med nyal po byed pa bris
12a5('dul ba): pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir ram/ gnas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
12a6('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya ni gnyis te/ dge 'dun gyi dang / gang zag gi'o// de la dge 'dun gyi ni dbus su 'khor lo bris la/ blo gnyis
12a7('dul ba): su ri dgas/ 'og tu gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming bri bar bya'o// gang zag gi ni rus pa'i keng rus sam/ mgo'i thod pa bri bar bya'o// / sdom ni sen mo 'dreg dang byi
12b1('dul ba): dor dang / a mra dang ni skyu ru ra// lhung bzed brgyad po bkag pa dang // rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
12b2('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe/ des
12b3('dul ba): 'dreg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/ kye skyes bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la/ 'phags pa rnams kyi sgra dang kha spu bregs shig/ de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi
12b4('dul ba): kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stongs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'chag cing 'dug pa des
12b5('dul ba): de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na ring mo zhig lon te/ gang nas 'ongs des smras pa/
12b6('dul ba): 'phags pa khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi sku dang kha spu theg pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo // des smras pa/ sen mo legs par 'dreg shes sam 'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi
12b7('dul ba): bzo lags so// bltas tshur/ de nyid nye bar 'ongs pa dang / nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo // 'dreg mkhan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci 'dra bar theg bzhin bzangs 'bru'i
13a1('dul ba): rtse mo ltang bregs shig/ des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang des spras pa/ da nir ba'i cog lta bu dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa ltar gyis shig/
13a2('dul ba): des de ji lta ji ltar bsgo ba de lta de lta bur byas pa dang / mjug tu smras pa/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song zhig ces des de nyi ma nub kyi
13a3('dul ba): bar du ma gtang ngo // de nyi ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang / mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'phags pa mang po ji snyed cig gi mgo dang kha su
13a4('dul ba): bregs bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spug la bregs dge slong gzu lums can nye dga' bos bdag bskor nas/ sen mo 'bru'i rtse mo dang / ra ba'i tsog dang / spu gri'i
13a5('dul ba): so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig
13a6('dul ba): 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song zhig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la/
13a7('dul ba): nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
13b1('dul ba): gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sen mo 'dreg pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o// 'dreg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
13b2('dul ba): kyis dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams sen mo ring po ring por 'dug pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci ste
13b3('dul ba): sen mo ring po ring por 'jog/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa ci khyed sen mo bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas
13b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ sen mo rnam pa gnyis po su
13b5('dul ba): gri'i so dang / lte'u ka lta bur breg par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe khyim
13b6('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhes bya ba thams cad de kho na bzhin no// khyod sen mo 'chos shes sam/ 'phags pa ji lta bur bgyi/
13b7('dul ba): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa khyod ko cung
14a1('dul ba): zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho ma ltar mnyam par gyis la song zhig ces mchi nas dag zong kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par
14a2('dul ba): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhing meng pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang bcom
14a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sen mo dag byi dor byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o//
14a4('dul ba): byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong tshon rtsi'i las dang / lhung bzed kyi las byed pa/
14a5('dul ba): rnams kyi sen mo dri ma chags la/ mdog mi sdug par gyur cing / de rnams sen mo de 'dra ba kho nar bsod snyoms la 'jug go// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa'aphags
14a6('dul ba): pa dag khyed ci'i phyir sen mo 'di lta bur dri ma chags shing mdog mi sdug/ de dag gis bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci'i phyir dri ma mi dbyi bcom ldan 'das kyis
14a7('dul ba): ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyed ci dri ma'i 'dam bca pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
14b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dri ma dbyi ba'i phyir sen mo bzhar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs
14b2('dul ba): can snying po'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ dus kyi gsar thog 'bru sar pa 'am/ 'bras bu sar pa gang ci yang rung / de dag dang por dge 'dun la 'bul lo// de'i 'og tu bdag nyid za'o// de'i
14b3('dul ba): blon po rnams kyis a mra'i shing thog dag phul ba dang / des smras pa/ song la 'phags pa rnams la phul cig/ de dag gis bgad pa dang des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci la dgod/
14b4('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ lha ci khyed nga ni 'phags pa rnams la dang por 'bul snyam dgongs kyi/ bdag cag gis ches sngar 'phags pa rnams la phul bar ni ma lags sam/ des smras pa
14b5('dul ba): gal te de lta na ngas 'phags pa rnams la stong gi kun dga' ra ba nyid phul lo// lnga legs te/ rjes su yi rang ngo // des phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong gi kun dga' ra ba
14b6('dul ba): phul nas/ deng dus ston kyang btsugs so// de ji ltar yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dus ston la lta bar 'ongs pa a mra'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim par gyur pa de ltar shing /
14b7('dul ba): thog rgyas par gyur to// de dge 'dun la phul lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis e mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du zos so// ji tsam na mtshams kyi rgyal po zhig la a mra dag
15a1('dul ba): dgos par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la po la btang ste/ grogs po bdag la a mra dag dgos kyis/ bskur ba'i rigs so zhes byas pa dang
15a2('dul ba): des po nya de la smras pa/ kye skyes bu ngas stong gi kun dga' ra ba de/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul gyis song la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la slong shig/ de 'od ma'i
15a3('dul ba): tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ rtag tu kun dga' ra ba'i sgo mi stongs par byed pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go//
15a4('dul ba): de de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te/ des spras pa/ rgyal po che ge mo zhig gis a mra'i ched du khyed kyi thad du btang na/ de'i slad du a mra dag stsal ba'i rigs so// des smras pa/ kye
15a5('dul ba): skyes bu song la a mra ji tsam dgongs pa de tsam long bzhig/ de song nas a mra'i shing rnams kyi drung du bltas na mi snang ste/ de slar log nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ma mchis so// nye dga' bos de khrid /
15a6('dul ba): nas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs te/ kun dga'i ra ba thams cad bskor nas smras pa/ kye skyes bu shang 'di la 'dzegs shig/ des 'dzegs na ma mthong ba dang / nye dga' bos spras pa kye skyes bu shar gyi
15a7('dul ba): yal gar song / lho dang nub kyi yal gar song / de thams cad du song nas sko bar gyur te babs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ci kun dga'i ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam bzhin bzangs ji
15b1('dul ba): lo re lo zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags so// 'phags pa ci drung dang chang pas thags sam/ bzhin 'azangs rlung dang chang pas ma thags kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag pa
15b2('dul ba): smin pa nyid du 'chos so// de slar log nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol ba/ lha 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal nas/ kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dgra ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so
15b3('dul ba): zhes gsung ngo // des smras pa/ legs te/ nga la longs spyad pa nyid dgongs so zhes byas pa dang / mi de slar song ngo // ji tsam na dus ston la bab pa'i tshe/ yul ma ga d+ha na
15b4('dul ba): gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci stong gi kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzangs dag ji ltar lo re lo re zhing
15b5('dul ba): shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so// 'phags pa dag gang na yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i
15b6('dul ba): tshogs thams cad a mra smin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba de khyed kyis 'bras bu ma smin pa kho nar 'chos te/ gang kho bo cag la gnod pa byas pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so// des smras pa
15b7('dul ba): 'di rgyal pos yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la byin pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ de lta bas na kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin zos so//
16a1('dul ba): khyed ci gtogs zhes byas pa dang / de dag 'phya spong kha zer bar byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
16a2('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams a mra dag za ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o// dge slong a
16a3('dul ba): mra dag za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag/ dge slong rnams la/
16a4('dul ba): shing sa ha ka ra'i shing thog dag 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom
16a5('dul ba): ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro 'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyi
16a6('dul ba): thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis mtshan nyid grub pa yin no zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la
16a7('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la mtshan nyid grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ tshag gu chags pa rnams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig/ dge slong rnams la a mra'i shing thog smin
16b1('dul ba): pa dag 'bral ba na zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pa rol tu mchi 'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/
16b2('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ mtshan nyid bye brag byed do zhes byas te bza' bar bya'o// de la mtshan nyid bye brag byed pa ni 'di
16b3('dul ba): dag yin te/ sha zhugs pa rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong
16b4('dul ba): nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs bdag 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs na/ sman sngon cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa je mar 'thung la sdum par gyis shig dang / bkru sman sbyin no//
16b5('dul ba): dedes mang 'thungs pa dang / skom pas gnod par gyur to// sman pa 'ongs te dris pa/ 'phags pa bde bar 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bdag skom pas gnod do// skyu ru ra tshangs
16b6('dul ba): shig ces byas pa dang / des lag tu blangs te 'dug go// yang sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ma bral lo// sman pas smras pa/ 'phags
16b7('dul ba): ba de'i tshe skya rung ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bzangs yod de 'di yin no// 'phags pa khar chongs shig/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje
17a1('dul ba): can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khar bcang ba'i bar du zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// des khar bcug nas
17a2('dul ba): 'dug go// yang sman pa de 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa sgom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs da dung ma bral lo// sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra khang ma
17a3('dul ba): bcangs sam/ bzhin bzangs bcangs te 'dug pa 'di yin no// des smras pa/ 'phags pa mur cig/ gzhan du na skom pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang
17a4('dul ba): ngo/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
17a5('dul ba): mur bar bya'o// mur mur nas bor gyis/ ma mid pa dang / skom pas rje gnod par gyur to// yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs shin tu
17a6('dul ba): gnod do// 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma mur ram/ bzhin bzangs mur nas bor ro// 'phags pa ci'i phyir ma ming bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go/ 'phags
17a7('dul ba): pa khyod ni nad pa yin la/ khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
17b1('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong dag gnang gis/ 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung / bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das/
17b2('dul ba): kyis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung ste/ bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa mi
17b3('dul ba): shes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyu ru ra dang / a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / na le zham mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khang na 'od
17b4('dul ba): ma'i tshal bya ka lan ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod chen po zhig gnas pa de gcer bu pa rnams la rab tu dad do//
17b5('dul ba): des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las
17b6('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems cam zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/
17b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing / khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i khyim ga la ba de logs su gshegs pa dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ma nas mthong ngo //
18a1('dul ba): mthong nas kyang kyang rlung ma khring nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sagyis/
18a2('dul ba): brang 'di sems can zhugs par gyur na/ ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i
18a3('dul ba): dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// des bcom ldan 'das la bza'
18a4('dul ba): ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa lhung bzed bkang ste phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces gsungs nas/ bsod snyoms bzhes te gshegs so// de dang ha cang mi ring ba
18a5('dul ba): zhig na gcer bu ba zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa gang bdag cag la bslang ba'i khyim gcig pu zhig yod pa de yang / dge sbyong go'u ta mas kha drangs kyis/ song la dge sbyong go'u ta mas ci lung bstan
18a6('dul ba): pa lta'o snyam mo// de der song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong ta ma 'ongs par gyur tam/ byon to// des ci zhig lung bstan/ 'phags pa bdag gis de la chung ma bstan te/ ci zhig btsa' bar 'gyur
18a7('dul ba): zhes bgyis pa dang / de bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byang nas/ nyon mongs pa thams
18b1('dul ba): cang spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo // gcer bu pa de rtsis mkhas pa zhig ste/ rdo rgyus kha dog dkar po spangs nas brtsis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/
18b2('dul ba): skad du lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gal te rjes su bsngags na ni khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dad par 'ong bas/ de bas na 'dir cung zad cig ni
18b3('dul ba): bsngags par bya/ cung zad cig ni smad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ lag pa kyogs/ bzhin bsgyur ba dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste lag pa kyog/ bzhin bsgyur
18b4('dul ba): des smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di la cung zad cig ni bden/ cung zad cig ni brdzun no// 'phags pa gang ni bden/ gang ni brdzun/ khyim bdag bu por btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni
18b5('dul ba): bden no// rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni bden na/ gsal ba ni me'i ming yin pas/ sems can skal pa chung ngu de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mes chag par
18b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro// lnga dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun te/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mir gyur pa lnga dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta
18b7('dul ba): mthong ngam nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bden te/ gang gi tshe 'di bza' ba yang med/ bgo ba yang med pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thang du rag
19a1('dul ba): tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun te/ re zhig
19a2('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na/ de'i nyan thos la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa//
19a3('dul ba): 'phags pa 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ gcer bu pas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba ste/ bslab pa blangs pa yin pas/ khyod nyid shes so zhes
19a4('dul ba): smras nas song ngo // shin tu bzang pos bsams pa/ 'di yong dor ro snyam nas/ sman ma yin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang / sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig pas/ sman ma yin pa de
19a5('dul ba): yang de la sman du gyur to// des de'i dku g.yon pa ma nye bar brtsams pa dang / mngal na 'dug pa de dku g.yas par song ngo // shin tu bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / de dku/
19a6('dul ba): g.yon par song ste/ srid pa tham pa'i sems can zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du/ bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do//
19a7('dul ba): khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma de dku mnyes pas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / khyim tshes dag gis thos nas/ rings pa rings par song ste dris pa/ shes ldan khyim bdag gi chung ma
19b1('dul ba): 'di ci ste du shin tu bzang pos spras pa gdon mi za bar 'di bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab po zhes byas pa dang / de dag dong ngo // shin tu bzang pos bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di 'dir gsang mi
19b2('dul ba): nus kyis dgon par bkri'o snyam nas/ des de dgon par khrid nas/ ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtsal nas/ des de sbas te khyim du khyer nas mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / phu nub dang //
19b3('dul ba): khyim tshes rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma shi'o// de dag gis ngu bar brtsams nas/ de dag ngu zhing / de gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams
19b4('dul ba): kyis khyogs brgyan nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro// gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas/ de dag dga' mgu rangs nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bsgreng ste
19b5('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu rgyu zhing smras pa/ shes ldan dag nyon cig/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i
19b6('dul ba): rlung ma bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
19b7('dul ba): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni shi nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro// re zhig shing gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang med pa de la/ yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang /
20a1('dul ba): lo ma 'byung bar lta ga la 'gyur/ skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rig pa 'amarnam par mi mkhyen
20a2('dul ba): pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ gsung ba gcig pu/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi
20a3('dul ba): nas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bsrabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi/
20a4('dul ba): mthil legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi bsnyengs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las
20a5('dul ba): yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa drug la rtag tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam
20a6('dul ba): yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/ grags pas phyogs bcur khyab pa/ stong la dbang sgyur bas khyad
20a7('dul ba): par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing / su ni nyams/ su ni dar / su ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/
20b1('dul ba): su ni stobs su chung par gyur/ su ni gnod par 'gyur/ su ni nyam nga ba dang / stobs su chung ba dang / gnod par gyur/ su ni ngar song la gzhos/ su ni ngan song la 'bab/ su ni ngan song la bang /
20b2('dul ba): gang ni ngan song las drangs nas/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la dgod/ gang zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya/ gang zhig gi bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya/ gang zhig smin pa
20b3('dul ba): ni grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// yang smras pa/ chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ni dus rlabs 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ sangs rgyas dus
20b4('dul ba): las mi 'da' 'o// ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i bu gcig la// lta zhing de yi srog kyang srung ba ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skye bo la// de bzhin gzigs shing de yi rgyud kyang srung
20b5('dul ba): thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud la gnas pa yi// thugs rje'i ba drus pa gshin be'u stor ba bzhin// srid pa bgrod dka' 'khyams par gyur pa yi// gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mi mkhyen par tshol//
20b6('dul ba): bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs shig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan
20b7('dul ba): 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ zhal nas 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/ kha cig ni steng du 'gro ste/
21a1('dul ba): gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni dmyal ba yang sos dang / mthing nag dang bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang /
21a2('dul ba): mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / sau thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar
21a3('dul ba): gas pa chen por song ste/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/ grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur nas 'bab bo// des sems can de
21a4('dul ba): rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad pa dang / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes zhes zer ro// de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i
21a5('dul ba): phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa gtong ste/ de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems shing shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin/ gzhan du skyes pa yang
21a6('dul ba): ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong ba zhig ste/ 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad ngo zhes zer ro// de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dang bas dmyal ba
21a7('dul ba): myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du sems can rnams snod du 'gyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to// gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i
21b1('dul ba): lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang
21b2('dul ba): 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu chen dang / mi che ba dang / mi
21b3('dul ba): gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya ba yang sgrogs so//
21b4('dul ba): tshigs bcad gnyis kyang sgrogs te/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// chos 'dus
21b5('dul ba): 'di la gang zhig ni// bag dang bcas par spyod byed pa// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur// de nas 'od gzer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
21b6('dul ba): rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ste/ de gal te bcom ldan 'das las/ 'das pa lung bstan par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
21b7('dul ba): snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye
22a1('dul ba): ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ long mor nub par 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro// ming skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/
22a2('dul ba): pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/
22a3('dul ba): phyag g.yas kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar nub par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du nub par 'gyur ro// rang
22a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'od/
22a5('dul ba): gzer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
22a6('dul ba): kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs tshon ni stong dag gis// bkra ba'i tshogs dag zhal gyi nang nas byung // nyi ma shar bar gyur pa ji lta bar// de yis/
22a7('dul ba): phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// tshigs su bcad de yang gsol pa// sangs rgyas rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs// rgyal ba dgra thul 'gro mchog rgyur gyur pa// rgyu ma mchis par pad+ma'i
22b1('dul ba): rtsa lag dang // dung ljar dkar ba'i badzum pa ston mi mjed// de ltas nyid kyi brtan thos dus mkhyen nas// rgyal dbang nyan po nyam par 'tshal rnams kyi// the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyes mchog gis/
22b2('dul ba): gsung mchog bzang zhing brtan pas bsal du gsol// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar brtan pa// zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston// mgon po ci sring 'dzum pa mdzad pa re/
22b3('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22b4('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs pa
22b5('dul ba): bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long zhig ces sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
22b6('dul ba): btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong dag gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur
22b7('dul ba): khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long zhig ces bsgo ba
23a1('dul ba): dang dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'khor zhi ba/
23a2('dul ba): grol ba/ 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs byin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rdum par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang /
23a3('dul ba): bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba klung gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dpaglang po che glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis
23a4('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lcu bu ga zam
23a5('dul ba): ze bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sa mkhan 'gron pa'i tshogs
23a6('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshong dpon tshong pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyis rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los/
23a7('dul ba): sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu nyi ma 'od gzer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags/
23b1('dul ba): skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bumig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nod sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis/
23b2('dul ba): bskong ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i tshogs kyis bsor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba wA bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lnga bu
23b3('dul ba): po che'i rgyal po dregs pa med pa lta bu/ dbang po shin tu dul bas spyod lam mi nyams par gshegs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brkyang cus/
23b4('dul ba): mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyad pa/ 'od nyi ma stong bas ldag pa/ rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres
23b5('dul ba): pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nyan thos chen po kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / rta thul dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / bzang po dang
23b6('dul ba): shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srungs dang / grags pa dang / gang po la sogs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang / srog chags brgya stong phal mo ches
23b7('dul ba): bskor nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so// sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod de/ bco brgyad gang zhe na/ me'i 'jigs pa med/ chu'i 'jigs pa med/ seng
24a1('dul ba): ge'i 'jigs pa med/ stag gi 'jigs pa med/ gzig gi 'jigs pa med/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med/ rkun po'i 'jigs pa med/ la gcan
24a2('dul ba): pa'i 'jigs pa med/ gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med/ sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med/ bsel rngan gyi 'jigs pa med/ mi'i 'jigs pa med/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med/ dus dus su
24a3('dul ba): gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur/ 'od chen po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi longs spyod dang /
24a4('dul ba): zang zing gi longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni gnod pa chung ba yin pas/ lha dang mi brgya stong du ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab 'bring du phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
24a5('dul ba): bsi lA tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so// rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig dang / bram ze'i khye'u byis pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu byung ste rtse zhing 'khod do// de gnyis
24a6('dul ba): las rgyas rigs kyi lce'u ni dngu pa dang ldan pa yin/ bram ze'i khyen ni de lta ma yin no// zab po'i 'u des/ bral rigs kyi khye'u la swA pa/ grags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi
24a7('dul ba): bangag shin tu bzang po'i chung ba'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab dubyung ste/ non mongs so
24b1('dul ba): thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba zhes srung bsadang/ ngani 'dri ba'i dus byas nas pas la gyi drung 'ong du ltu na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/
24b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa brdzun du ma gyur krung / rgyal rigs kyi khye des tshigs su bcang ba rnas pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa lu s+phu'i yang sring // sa 'di ri dang nags bcas ma sa
24b3('dul ba): 'gro yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni bskum par 'gyur srid kyi// drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa mim/ bram ze'i khye'u des grogs po de lta na bsil tshal gyi dung khrod
24b4('dul ba): zhing 'dong ngo zhes smras nas/ de gnyis dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho nas mthong
24b5('dul ba): nas/ yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa the tshom bral zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba// ri dgas rgyal po lta bu'i sgra skad mchog sgrogs shing // the tshom med par pha rol smra bas mi brdzib
24b6('dul ba): 'di ltar skye bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bsko zhing gshegs// bsil tshul phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lta bu'o// bsil ba'i ngang can drung ni langs par gyur pa nA// shAkya thub pa'i rdzu
24b7('dul ba): 'phrul brdeg pa'i don gyi bying // lnga tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges// rgyal po gzugs cam snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang ba'i chung ma'i bu
25a1('dul ba): khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing lnga dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung skye/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
25a2('dul ba): spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ de ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du phyung zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos kyi
25a3('dul ba): dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ni don med par bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du mi//
25a4('dul ba): gshegs pas/ bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma las brten te/ gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mjed par 'gyur gor ma chag gis/ bltar 'gro'o snyam nas/ de btsun
25a5('dul ba): mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs kyi mis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des/ rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs pa
25a6('dul ba): snying po thug ring po kho na das mthong nas/ yang rigs su bcad pa smras bya/ sag d+ha mi mnga' bdas rgyam mtsham tsam 'ad// 'di ltar lang bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba yis// khyer ro
25a7('dul ba): mas kyi 'byong sa phun sum tshogs par raM// bdag gi zhing la nges pa'i blo ga skyes par 'gyur// rgya la mtshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ras// gshegs gul bye ba pa
25b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gal 'jum pa mdzad cing / skye ba rnams kyi gung la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu pa dag gis mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di sang dge tsun
25b2('dul ba): koru tam bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing / skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug pa las na/ sems can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas/ des khyim bdag shin tu bzung po la smras pa/ khyim bdag sems can
25b3('dul ba): skal ba chung ngu 'di ni ma shi'o// des smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar gyur na/ skabs 'di la da ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag kho bo ni bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par zangs pa
25b4('dul ba): yin gyis/ khyod nyid shes par gyis shig/ des bud shing bcer te chung ma'i ro de me'i phung po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang / de'i lus thams cad tshig na lto'i nye 'khor de bzhin du 'dug no//
25b5('dul ba): de nas lto'i nye 'khor de rdol nas pad+ma byung ste/ pad+ma de'i snying po las gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/ bstan sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig byung ngo // de srog chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas
25b6('dul ba): mchog tu ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur pa dang / gcer bu pa dag gi rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dag nyams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la/
25b7('dul ba): bka' stsal ba/ khyim bdag gzhon nu long zhig/ des gcer bu pa'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag me phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na thams cad kyi thams
26a1('dul ba): kyi / u nga / zu / Sh+Ta / sa
26a2('dul ba): zhugs te blangs so// rgyal ba'i bka' yis me yi phung por zhugs gyur te// de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas zang ba na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis me ni zhi ba nyid gyur cing // kha ba'i tshogs lta
26a3('dul ba): bsil ba'ang skad cig de la byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod nyams pa'i gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam/ des gsol pa/
26a4('dul ba): btsun pa bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du btsas shing / rgyal po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur yanga'adi ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsan dan sa mchog pa lta bur bsil
26a5('dul ba): bar gyur pa 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma myong lags so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di ljong zhig/ de log par lta ba
26a6('dul ba): phyogags pas re zhig len par mi byed cing gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar byed do// des smras pa/ khyim bdag mang du smra ci dgos/ mes ni thams cad 'tshag pa yin na/ gzhon nu shin/
26b1('dul ba): theg la brdung ba 'angamamig pa las na/ 'di khyod kyi byin du khyer ma khyod kyi khyim yang cig cing / khyod tu thog gi bang chang du yang 'gyur ba ngas so// des bdag las gnas pa zeng dang /
26b2('dul ba): nasade ma blangs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo srungs gzugs can snying po lnga bka' stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long zhig/ nges gus
26b3('dul ba): sgrim pa dang bcas pas lag pa brkyang ste/ de blangs nas kun tu brtags te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di'i ming cing gdags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po
26b4('dul ba): po khye'u 'di 'di ltar me'i nang nas skyes pas/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming me skyes zhes bya bar gdags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsams pa dang
26b5('dul ba): bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos nas/ khyad par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan pa
26b6('dul ba): mdzad pas/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ka kha cig gis
26b7('dul ba): nirab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni jo bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang kha cig gis ni
27a1('dul ba): rtse mo dang / kha cig gis ni bzod pa chung ngu dang / 'bring bskyed par gyur to// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
27a2('dul ba): byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag
27a3('dul ba): par blangs te/ 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par gyur to// de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes
27a4('dul ba): ma ma brgyad po// pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs kyi mA ma gnyis la rjes su gtang ngo //
27a5('dul ba): de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing
27a6('dul ba): rdzing na gnas pa'i 'dra bzhin du byung du sbed par byed do// de'i na ma thong thogs te yus gzhan du song bangs/ ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhums par gyu bar/
27a7('dul ba): ldang 'das kyis kyi rung skye ba gyur / rigs 'bang bar 'gyur ri skadang ma 'o sa la yang myong bar byar rjes nga'i bathun pa la rab tu byung / nan mangs pa thams ca
27b1('dul ba): pa da pa sun rgyu nga zu na / nga
27b2('dul ba): bdag gi gling mong 'chi ba'i dus la 'ab po zhes zis so// zos nas kyang thasamasam ldan 'das kyis de'i bu kye'u skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar dar 'gyur
27b3('dul ba): wA dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ 'on mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ da ba cos bya zhing mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes spyang/
27b4('dul ba): bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de brdzun du ma gyur tam snyam nas/ des khyim tshes dag la dris pa/ bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de/ bcom
27b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis khye'ur 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lnga dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra
27b6('dul ba): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bsdam par thos so// thos nas bdag kun tu dga' ba las/ de yang 'chi ba'i dus la bab po zhes thos na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
27b7('dul ba): pa de brdzun du ma gyur tam/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la ltung yang srid// sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid // rgya
28a1('dul ba): chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi// drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa brdzun du mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar
28a2('dul ba): khyim thab des de ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas/ de'i khye'u dbang zang chen po can mer bsregs kyang ma chag pa mthu bo che zhig/ da ltar rgyal pos
28a3('dul ba): pho brang na gso zhing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang / de khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig byas so// ci zhig byas gcer bu bas/
28a4('dul ba): bslus nas/ khyod kyis nga'i sring mo la sems can zhugs pa/ ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab par byas so// de'i khye'u dbang thang can mer
28a5('dul ba): bsregs kyang ma chog pa mthu bo che zhig/ da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug pa de la ni re zhig ci byar yang med de/ 'di ltar da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on
28a6('dul ba): te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi bgyi/ rabs yig kyang dong zhing / lem po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos
28a7('dul ba): dag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnong po yang byed du gzhug go zhes smras pa dang / sa
28b1('dul ba): de thos nas skrag ste/ de skad smra ba dang sbyar na/ bdag la de ltar byed par nges so snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i kun du song ste rkang pa gnyis sa phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ lnga bdag gi
28b2('dul ba): po'i mchid nas/ da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on+da te mi sten na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi 'ardzi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing lam po che dang / srang dang / lam
28b3('dul ba): sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal po'i
28b4('dul ba): gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas/ de'i slad du lhas gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu me skyes ngas khyod las blangs pa
28b5('dul ba): ma yin gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la gtad pa yin pas/ khyod la gal te gzhon nu dgos na/ gzhon nu'i ched du bcom ldan 'das la sngar zhus shig/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song /
28b6('dul ba): nas/ zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nye du bo'i mching na/ da yang gal te gzhon nu de zangs na de lta na legs/ 'on te mo ldan na
28b7('dul ba): ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim 'dag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi srings
29a1('dul ba): bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas de
29a2('dul ba): slad du gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag chub skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par
29a3('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ nga'i bkas a rog gya zhes
29a4('dul ba): byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes byin cig/ gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i
29a5('dul ba): dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang zhi zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bkar mnyan nas/
29a6('dul ba): nu ring rdzogs 'a phyi sa/ rdus sto gzugs par snying po la 'di sang sa smras so// sa ldan 'das kyis khyod ma rgyal po chen pos rlog kyi zhes bkara' ba
29a7('dul ba): byams mas kya
29b1('dul ba): gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad
29b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes smras te song ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di ngas bskyed de/ yid du 'ong gi
29b3('dul ba): sdug pa yin pas/ dam tshig bcas la sbyin par bya ste/ nyi ma re re la yang dus gsum gsum du nga bsdu ba'i phyir gtong na sbyin par bya'o// des smras pa/ lnga khyod kyi spyan sngar mi gtang na gzhan su'i
29b4('dul ba): thang du gtang bar bgyi/ gtang bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ glang po che la bskyon nas btang ngo // 'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ ji srid du
29b5('dul ba): pa gson pa de srid du bu'i ming mi sgrogs so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ gzhon nu me skyes pa'i khyim na gnas par gyur te/ de sangs
29b6('dul ba): rgyas la mngon par dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dang / sangs rgyas la skyabs su song // chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo // des khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos phyogs gang
29b7('dul ba): du bdag gi ma bsang ba'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang brtsig tu bcug nas/ yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul nas 'di ltar gnas brtan/
30a1('dul ba): ngag gis gis kyang mdo sde dag la/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dku mnyed pa'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes nye bar sbyar ro// khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i mi zho
30a2('dul ba): shas 'tsho ba yul gzhan du dong ba dag gis/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo// gzhon nu me skyes ni rang gi khyim na gnas te/ de sangs rgyas la mngon par dang / chos
30a3('dul ba): dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad / sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag gis tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed gcig/
30a4('dul ba): rin po che dag gis bkang ste khyim bdag po skyes la smos su bsgyur ro// des kyang de shing ring po'i rtse mo la btags te bzhag nas/ 'di sa brjes 'di sus kyang smras dang / sa gang dang /
30a5('dul ba): ngag gis blang bar mi bya'i// 'di ltar dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba de dag las 'ga' zhig gis len na/ des ni 'di ci bder khyer la rag go zhes dril
30a6('dul ba): bsgrags pa yang byas so// gzhan mu stegs can rnams nang par sngar langs nas/ chu ngogs dag tu nye reg byed du 'dong ba de dag gis de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/
30a7('dul ba): khyim bdag 'di chi min/ des de dgas rgyas par bskrad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod shA kya bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas pa/ de dag nyid len par 'gyur ri nas
30b1('dul ba): spras nas dong ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gnas brnyan gnas brtan dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong nas/ de dag gis kyang / khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim
30b2('dul ba): bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyas par bskrad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gi yon tan ni bcab par bya/ skyon ni bsgrag par
30b3('dul ba): bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ ji lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du bdag nyid bstan par bya 'am zhes smras nas dong ngo // ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pa de phyogs der 'ongs te/ khyim bdag
30b4('dul ba): la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des ji lta bu yin pa smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pas bsams pa/ bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs
30b5('dul ba): pa'i tshogs rnams spangs shing bor la/ gsal zhing sbyang ba byas na/ khyim bdag gis bdag mu stegs can dang rdzu 'phrul bsgrin par chad kyis de'i phyir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o snyam nas/ des
30b6('dul ba): lag pa glang po che'i sna lta'u brkyang ste/ lhung bzed de blangs nas/ des de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo // de la dge slong gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyi tsan ngan sa mchog pa'i sbung
30b7('dul ba): bzeng 'jig pas mchos/ des nga ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod srung bzed tsam gyi cing du khyim pa'i mdud du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung
31a1('dul ba): de tshe dang ldan pa dag rung yang bra/ mi rung yang bla ste/ byas zin pas da ci byar yang med do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gso/
31a2('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o// rnam par ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
31a3('dul ba): lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po// gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po// rag
31a4('dul ba): dang / zangs dang / 'khar ba dang / shing las byas pa dag las/ 'di ltar lhung bzed snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ma blangs pa yang blang bar mi bya la/ blangs pa yang
31a5('dul ba): gtang bar bya'o// lhung bzed phyi ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni// ma blangs pa ni blang bar mi bya zhing / blangs pa na sman phor du longs spyad pas spyad par bya ba yin no// 'di ltar
31a6('dul ba): lcags dang / sa'i lhung bzed gnyis ni byin gyis 'arlab tu rung ba dag yin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag me skyes lnga dang mi'i drapal yang myong bar gyur nas/ rgyal po'i khab dang /
31a7('dul ba): tsam pa dag gi bar na sho gam gyi gnas shig yod pa de'i sho gam pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas/ de gnod sbyin gdug pa zhig tu skyes pa dang / des bu'i rmi lom du 'di skad ces bu khyod kyis
31b1('dul ba): gnas 'dir gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su chug la/ der dril yang gyis la thogs shig dang / gang gi tshe deng su dag zong las go kam mi 'jal bar 'gro bar byed pa de'i tshe/
31b2('dul ba): dril de skra 'byin par byed cing / de dag phyir ldog pa las sho ga mchod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// des gnyen bshes dang / nye du dang / rtsa lag dag pa rmi lam de bzlas nas/
31b3('dul ba): nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang / gza' dang / rgya skar dang / dus shis pa la bab pa'i tshe gnas der gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su bcug nas/ der dril yang byas te/
31b4('dul ba): btags so// grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis// rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang / bram ze me des bsams pa/ bdag bram zes thabs de dang de dag gis bsgrubs pa'i
31b5('dul ba): nor dag spyod cing / las ci yang mi byed par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ de tshong dus su song ste/ ras bal nyos nas sel gyis zhag par byas shing
31b6('dul ba): bkas te/ tha ga pa mkhas pa la ka sha pa Na stong ri ba'i ras bung gcig 'bag tu bcug go// de nas des/ zam zi la smras pa/ ras zung 'di kar sha ga ca stong ri ba lags kyis/
31b7('dul ba): dus su bzhung la gang dag kar sha pa Na stong gis 'jal ba la ni stsol cig gagal te nges mi 'jam na/ tshong dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags nas / gzhan bzhung bar mdzod cig/ des de khyer
32a1('dul ba): te tshong dus su song ba na kar sha pa Na stong gis nyob su yang med nas/ des tshong dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags te ga ras zung de gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste/
32a2('dul ba): 'gron pa dag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo // ji tsam na tsam pa'i bar gyi sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / sho gam pas 'gron pa de dag la sho gam bcad pa na/ de dag gis sho kam phu
32a3('dul ba): nas dong ngo // de nas dril sgra 'byin par byed nas/ sho gam pa dag gis spras pa/ shes ldan dag jil 'di ltar sgra 'byin pa las na/ 'gron pa dag gis sho gam legs par ma phul gor mchas
32a4('dul ba): gis yang sho gam gtsang ngo zhes/ de dag gis 'gron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste/ btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do// de dag dong ba dang / yang dril sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed nas/
32a5('dul ba): de dag gis 'gron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste/ btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas/ 'gron pa dag nged la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam/ ci na yang dang yang
